characterDescription: Vao, along with Temoo and Thinker, is searching for Hoid, though his motivation for this is unknown. Since Vao is not belived to be his real name, Ishikk has nicknamed him 'Blunt'. Blunt has been identified as Baon who is a character in the graphic novel White Sand. His world of origin is Taldain.

characterDetails.Appearance: Blunt is described by Ishikk as being dark-skinned - like a Makabaki - but tall, with short dark hair, lean muscles, and broad shoulders.
